doc:
Hugh Beaumont https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hugh_Beaumont 0 Eugene Hugh Beaumont (February 16, 1909 – May 14, 1982) was an American actor and television director. He was also licensed to preach by the Methodist church. Beaumont is best known for his portrayal of Ward Cleaver on the television series Leave It to Beaver, originally broadcast from 1957 to 1963. He had earlier played the role of the private detective Michael Shayne in a series of films in the 1940s. Eugene_Hugh_Beaumont ( February_16_,_1909 – May_14_,_1982 ) was an_American_actor_and_television_director . He was_also_licensed_to_preach by the_Methodist_church . He had earlier played the_role of the_private_detective_Michael_Shayne in a_series of films in the_1940s .
